About.hero: Hello, we are a design firm based in Japan.</br></br>We value unconscious gestures and trivial psychology that we glimpse at moments in our daily lives. Sometimes we tolerate people's laziness and view life with a generous heart. We try to touch materials and objects that we usually use without thinking about them with new feelings. We go back and reconsider the common sense and rules that have been set in stone.  What we value in design is to observe daily life from a pure perspective, to discover the values that emerge, and to make them permeate into the lives of those who use and view them,</br>We then refine and refine it to a form that will permeate the user and the viewer, and give it a new form.</br></br>We also place importance on the fact that we are not only designers, but also users. We approach design not only from the perspective of the creator, but also from the perspective of the user who actually touches the product. We work together as partners who can exchange opinions without any discovery through proposals that have been thought through from these multifaceted perspectives.
About.keishiDesc: He is a designer born in Japan.</br>After graduating from Tama Art University, Department of Design, majoring in product design, he joined the Design Department of TOTO Ltd.</br>He has designed many international and domestic public products such as faucets and showers.</br>After working at Nippon Design Center, he established Design Studio with Ryoji Tomiya in 2023.</br>Past awards include the reddot design award and the reddot design award grand prize.
About.ryojiDesc: Producer from Fukuoka Prefecture.</br>Graduated from Kyushu University, Faculty of Law. Joined a major advertising agency in the same year.</br>He has worked on advertising communication projects for a wide variety of industries, including beverage, pharmaceutical, human resources, consumer electronics, and PC manufacturers.</br>From production work such as TV commercial production, graphic production, and campaign design, He also has a wide range of experience in media operations such as TV commercials, graphic production, and campaign design, as well as mass media placement such as TV commercials, digital advertising management, and SEO.</br>In 2023, he established design studio to with Keishi Tomiya.
